DOC.brief_title: Preoperative Treatment With Cetuximab and/or IMC-A12

Study Groups : If find eligible take part study , randomly assign ( roll dice ) 1 3 group . There equal chance assign group . - Group 1 receive cetuximab alone . - Group 2 receive IMC-A12 alone . - Group 3 receive cetuximab IMC-A12 combination . If assign group 2 3 hearing test within 90 day start treatment study drug . Study Treatment : Groups 1 3 : Cetuximab give vein Days 1 8 . The first dose give 2 hour . The second dose give 1 hour . To low risk allergic reaction , Groups 1 3 also receive diphenhydramine mouth vein first dose cetuximab . If study doctor decides need , diphenhydramine may also give second dose cetuximab ( third , applicable ) . Groups 2 3 : IMC-A12 give vein 1 hour Days 1 8 . All Groups : You surgery Day 10 . You sign separate consent form describe surgery risk detail .
